mapper.insert: insert into member (ucode, id, pw, email, name) values (ucode_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{name})
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select * from member where sessionKey = #{sessionId} and sessionLimit > SYSDATE

select t1.ORDERS_NUM, t1.PROD_NUM, ORDERER, SELLER, ORDERS_PAYMENT, ORDERS_QUANTITY, ORDERS_OPTION, ORDERS_DATE, ORDERS_STATE, t2.PROD_NAME, t2.prod_thumb0, t3.id as seller_id, t4.REVIEW_NUM from( select ORDERS_NUM, PROD_NUM, ORDERER, SELLER, ORDERS_PAYMENT, ORDERS_QUANTITY, ORDERS_OPTION, ORDERS_DATE, ORDERS_STATE, row_number() over(order by ORDERS_NUM desc) as num from ORDERS where ORDERER= #{ucode} and ORDERS_DATE > (SELECT SYSDATE - #{term} FROM DUAL) ) t1, product t2, member t3, review t4 where t1.PROD_NUM = t2.PROD_NUM and t1.seller = t3.ucode and t1.ORDERS_NUM = t4.ORDERS_NUM(+) and num BETWEEN #{str_num} and #{end_num}

select count(*) from( select ORDERS_NUM, PROD_NUM, ORDERER, SELLER, ORDERS_PAYMENT, ORDERS_QUANTITY, ORDERS_OPTION, ORDERS_DATE, ORDERS_STATE, row_number() over(order by ORDERS_NUM desc) as num from ORDERS where ORDERER= #{ucode} and ORDERS_DATE > (SELECT SYSDATE - #{term} FROM DUAL) )
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_num, prod_num, review_writer, review_content, review_rating, orders_num) values (review_num_seq.nextval, #{prod_num}, #{review_writer}, #{review_content}, #{review_rating}, #{orders_num})
